CARD_list_all

CARD_list_all.Rd

List all the CARD parametrization files in a tibble to get all the metadata of the aggregation variables available.

Usage

CARD_list_all()

See also

    1. CARD_list_all() list all available CARD.

  1. CARD_management() for managing CARD parameterization files.

  2. CARD_extraction() for extracting variables using CARD.

Examples

# Get all the available variables
metaEX_all = CARD_list_all()
# And why note filter it by topic
dplyr::filter(metaEX_all, grepl("Low Flow", topic_en))
#> # A tibble: 144 × 22
#>    CARD_name                variable_en unit_en name_en description_en method_en

#>  3 delta{startLF}_summer_H3 delta{star… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#>  4 delta{centerLF}_summer_… delta{cent… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#>  5 delta{centerLF}_summer_… delta{cent… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#>  6 delta{centerLF}_summer_… delta{cent… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#>  7 delta{endLF}_summer_H1   delta{endL… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#>  8 delta{endLF}_summer_H2   delta{endL… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#>  9 delta{endLF}_summer_H3   delta{endL… day     Averag… In summer, da… "1. no t…
#> 10 delta{dtLF}_summer_H1    delta{dtLF… day     Averag… In summer, du… "1. no t…
